PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The energy loss from the low output voltage of the photovoltaic devices ( 0.38 - 0.4 V ) can be attributed to the relatively large difference between the LUMO levels of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM ( i.e.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 0.38 - 0.4 V |
| the low output voltage of the photovoltaic devices |
| the LUMO levels of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM |

Note: LUMO stands for Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital, which is a property of a molecule. However, in this context, it appears that the specific LUMO levels of the molecules PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM are being referred to, so I have included them as property values.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 0.38 - 0.4 V |

Note: In this paragraph, there is only one clear reference to a value of a material property, which is the energy loss from the low output voltage of the photovoltaic devices, specifically given as "0.38 - 0.4 V". The other entities mentioned, such as "the relatively large difference between the LUMO levels of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM" and "the low output voltage of the photovoltaic devices" are not values of material properties, but rather descriptions of properties or comparisons between properties.
